text: "Misery and Gin" is a 1980 song by Merle Haggard and is the leading single from his 31st studio album Back to the Barrooms. It was used in the 1980 movie Bronco Billy and went to number 3 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs chart and number 4 on the Canadian RPM Country Track chart. It was covered by Billy Dean in 1994. Category:1980 songs Category:Country songs Category:Merle Haggard songs
title: Misery and Gin
